armorstatues.item.armor_stand.descriptio: Shift + right-click to open configuration screen when placed.
armorstatues.screen.style.invisible.desc: Makes the armor stand itself invisible, but still shows all equipped items.
armorstatues.screen.style.noBasePlate.de: Hide the stone base plate at the armor stand's feet.
armorstatues.screen.style.noGravity.desc: Prevents the armor stand from falling down, so it may float freely.
armorstatues.screen.style.showArms.descr: Shows the armor stand's arms, so it may hold items in both hands.
armorstatues.screen.style.showName.descr: Render the armor stand's name tag above it's head.
armorstatues.screen.style.small.descript: Makes the armor stand half it's size like a baby mob.
